entry.title: [Belgium][VoIP] - Phone number transfert unavailable
entry.content:
Mar 21, 09:54 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident with our third-party provider in Belgium has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 14/03/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 20/03/2025 17:00 UTC
Root Cause : Our provider has resolved the incident.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Mar 20, 14:36 UTC
Identified - [Belgium][VoIP] - Phone number transfert unavailable

We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : A fix is being implemented.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Mar 19, 10:49 UTC
Investigating - An incident is in progress with our third-party provider in Belgium, customers wanting to use the impacted service may face some difficulties. Please find the details:

Start time : 14/03/2025 08:00 UTC
Service impact : Belgians' phone number transfer (in and out) are stuck at the moment.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are actively working to resolve the incident and restore services as quickly as possible

If a customer opened a transfer (in our out) request between OVHcloud and an other Belgian operator for Belgian' phone number, it will be stuck (in waiting state) for the time being.

We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA2][Web Hosting] - Maintenance on all cluster
entry.content:
Mar 21, 00:36 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.
All services are operational. There has been no impact since 21/03/2025 00:32 UTC

Mar 20, 21:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 28, 14:47 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the maintenance.

Please find below an update on the situation:
New start time : 20/03/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 21/03/2025 00:00 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance, you may experience some disruptions to our services on all impacted clusters. Specifically:
• Suspension of traffic from AI and content indexing bots and crawlers on all impacted clusters: To prevent any potential issues, we will temporarily suspend traffic from AI and content indexing bots and crawlers on all impacted clusters.
• Possible slowness on perso/pro offers : You may notice slower loading times or delayed responses when accessing your website or applications.
In addition :
• Possible slowness on metrics or logs on clusters 002 / 005 / 007 / 010 / 012 / 013 / 014 / 017 : Metrics and logs access may be delayed or slow during the maintenance period.
• Possible slowness on mails on clusters 005 / 017 : Sending mail from websites may be delayed or slow during the maintenance period.
• Slowness on operations on clusters 011 / 014 / 017
Service improvement : This maintenance is link to : https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/ndkfnxy1ylv4

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Service impact : During this maintenance, you may experience some disruptions to our services on all impacted clusters. Specifically:
• Suspension of traffic from AI and content indexing bots and crawlers on all impacted clusters: To prevent any potential issues, we will temporarily suspend traffic from AI and content indexing bots and crawlers on all impacted clusters.
• Possible slowness on perso/pro offers : You may notice slower loading times or delayed responses when accessing your website or applications.

In addition :

• Possible slowness on metrics or logs on clusters 003->017 : Metrics and logs access may be delayed or slow during the maintenance period.
• Possible slowness on mails on clusters 005 : Sending mail from websites may be delayed or slow during the maintenance period.
• Slowness on operations on clusters 004, 006, 012

Service improvement : This maintenance is link to : https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/sdll5vsc7x1v

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding as we work to improve our services.

Thank you for your understanding.
